name: Reflex Dash
description:
Fly, freeze and seek new adventures with the new mega-atmospheric Reflex Dash game.

You play as a robot that meets bombs of different strengths on its way, can you go further than the rest?

Lasers, Freezing, Regeneration and Shields will help you with this. Do not forget that stocks aren't endless and replenish them in time, because every thing counts when you are faced with the strongest techno world.
